spell.name: Ordained Purpose
entries: You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose. Enemies in the area take {@damage 4d6} mental damage and must attempt a Will save. A creature that has lost abilities as a result of performing acts anathema to its deity or beliefs (such as a champion who violated their tenets and hasn't atoned) uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw. At the GM's discretion, a creature currently filling its appointed station and purpose (such as a farmer working in a field or a criminal in the act of committing a crime) uses the outcome one degree of success better than the result of its saving throw.

entries.Failure: The creature takes full damage and must {@action Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn.
entries.Critical Failure: The creature takes double damage, must {@action Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn, and can't {@action Stand} during its next turn.

spell.name: Split The Tongue
spell.trigger: A creature within 30 feet fails a {@skill Deception} or {@skill Diplomacy} check.
entries: The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} slashing damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Failure: The creature takes full damage and is {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
